website_summaries.verdict: Whether you are looking for your first metal vase or find that the material fits your decorative style, this 7.5-inch model offers a nice design and price.
pros: Has a rustic appearance that pairs nicely with farmhouse or country decor
Made of iron with a galvanized finish that holds up well to rust and corrosion
Attractive heart etching on the front
cons: Metal is somewhat thin, and a few leaks have been reported
Won't hold water, but opening is wide enough that it may be possible to fit a liner inside

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: Over all it is a cute vase. Although it’s smaller than expected it’s still cute. Maybe I need to read the description better next time. A good addition to my living room!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty
customer_reviews.text: I am using this to hold artificial flowers as a table centerpiece and I just love it. The only weird thing about it is but I can’t figure out how to clean off a smudge because of the finish. I’m afraid to scrub at it too much. Overall though it is lovely and I’m very pleased with it!
customer_reviews.author: RUSSELL HANCOCK

customer_reviews.title: Adorable!
customer_reviews.text: This is so cute! Great quality. I bought it as a gift and they loved it! So adorable. If you’re trying to decide if you should buy it, you should! Just make sure to check the measurements first. It’s not huge, but not tiny either. It was the perfect size.
customer_reviews.author: Erica

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend these.
customer_reviews.text: These milk cans are very nice. Well made and arrived save and sound. ( ones I ordered from another sell arrived crushed). These are sturdy, about 7 inches tall and perfect for center pieces for an up coming Rustic Wedding. Great buy. Really nice looking.
customer_reviews.author: Teddy H.

customer_reviews.title: Grey accent decor
customer_reviews.text: This milk can looks so nice on my table. It matches great with my grey accents. Great quality for the price.
customer_reviews.author: lynnette esposito

customer_reviews.title: not watertight
customer_reviews.text: I bought this petit vintage milk carton to use as a vase with water and live flowers and it does not hold up. As soon as I filled it up, I noticed a steady drip from the bottom seam. Super cute for decor, but don’t plan on using it as a real vase because it will not hold water.
customer_reviews.author: Becca

customer_reviews.title: Nice addition
customer_reviews.text: I should have read the description a little better. Very cute, light weight. Will definitely be a nice addition to my livingroom. Just wish it was a little bigger. Could be a few bucks lower in price. Definitely wouldn't have paid what I did in person. Over all it's cute just expected a little more.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.text: This is so cute! It’s small, but looks so cute on my ladder shelf! I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Veronica Espinoza

customer_reviews.title: Simple yet very cute.
customer_reviews.text: Pretty. It's what I was looking for. Looks a little more blue against a light gray wall. But all gray tones are different.

customer_reviews.title: Cute!
customer_reviews.text: Smaller than it looks in pictures, it’s super cute but I don’t think it’s worth the price. Can find something similar for cheaper.

customer_reviews.text: when i buy a vase.. i expect it to not leak. i guess i have high expectations??? 🤔

customer_reviews.title: Color
customer_reviews.text: It looks more blue than white, like I ordered. Very small as well
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Reilly

customer_reviews.title: Pretty but small and a bit overpriced
customer_reviews.text: Read the description and check the size before you buy. I feel this was waaaay too small for the price you are buying it for. I had a $10 gift card so I used that to buy it. Its just a tad bit bigger than my coffee mug! Its pretty, looks exactly like photo and is sturdy BUT its really small. I'm satisfied with the purchase but I wish they showed you how small it is. I wouldn't pay $16 for this, maybe just $9 or $10.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen

customer_reviews.title: Well made...I love it!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! Well made...I love it! Exactly what I was looking for to put in my kids bathroom. It's a very soft white maybe almost super light gray in appearance whitewash over galvanized metal. The whitewash is neatly done with medium brown accent trim . The galvanized metal is light but it doesn't feel cheap. The faux sunflowers I purchased for it were too long, so I just bent the steams slightly and they were a perfect fit. Would definitely purchase this item again and recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Skribbles76

customer_reviews.title: Cannot hold water
customer_reviews.text: It's really cute, I love it. But you can only put dried or artificial flowers in it. I tried putting water in it (thankfully before I bought flowers) to see if it would hold, but it leaks at the bottom. You can probably seal it with silicon or something, but I wasn't inclined to do so. ~Amy S.
customer_reviews.author: Amy S.

customer_reviews.title: Nicely made
customer_reviews.text: It is very pretty and light weight. I thought it would be a little heavier but really nice.

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service
customer_reviews.text: First one came dented, so now I have to ship it back which is inconvenient. Needed better packaging. But I did receive a return label very fast. Material is a little thin, but that's expected for the low price paid. Overall it's cute!
customer_reviews.author: CW

customer_reviews.title: As expected
customer_reviews.text: Cheaply made but cute. This is not going to hold anything top heavy. Light fake flowers work. Not sure if worth the money but it's the look I wanted.

product_meta.title: HIDERLYS 7.5" High Decorative Vase with Unique Heart-Shaped and Rope Design, Galvanized Finish- Rustic Decorated for Living Room, Bedroom, Kitchen (Grey)
feature_bullets: 【PERFECT DESIGN】There are two little handles, one each side in the style of traditional milk can. And the paint finish has been painted in a distressed style shabby look to give it a vintage feel
【EXTENSIVE USES】Its petite size allows it to fit on any tabletop surfaces and work great with artificial flowers, perfect for office or home décor
【MEASUREMENTS/MATERIAL】7.5" x 4.1" x 3.9", grey in color and made of iron. This Milk Can for decorative use only. We don' t recommend it for holding water!
【NOTE】Recently, there are some illegal guys, posing as my products for sale. To ensure your shopping rights and benefits, please choose the seller **HIDERLYS** correctly
【HIDERLYS GUARANTEE】If you have any quality issues, simply reach out to us via an Amazon message. We offer unconditional returns or refunds for 30 days
